question: Which country will host 2017 FIBA Women's Asia Cup basketball tournament?
explanation: India will host 2017 FIBA Women\'s Asia Cup basketball tournament at Bengaluru, Karnataka from July 23 to 29.  This tournament will be the qualifying tournament for FIBA Asia at the 2018 FIBA World Championship for Women in Spain.  Beside this, India will also host the 2017 FIBA U-16 Women\'s Asian Championship, which will be held from October 22 to 28 in Hyderabad. In both the tournaments, 14 teams will compete, with 8 teams in Division A and six in lower Division B. India is in Division B in both the Senior and U-16 events.
